TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExportAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定某个类型、属性、字段或方法提供特定的导出。

span.span: Specifies that a type, property, field, or method provides a particular export.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在特性化编程模型中， 声明部件导出或提供给组合容器，该对象用于满足特定协定的对象。In the Attributed Programming Model, the declares that a part exports, or provides to the composition container, an object that fulfills a particular contract. 在撰写过程中，具有匹配协定的导入的部件将具有由导出的对象填充的这些依赖项。During composition, parts with imports that have matching contracts will have those dependencies filled by the exported object. 可以修饰整个类，也可以修饰类的属性、字段或方法。The can decorate either an entire class, or a property, field, or method of a class. 如果修饰整个类，则类的实例是导出的对象。If the entire class is decorated, an instance of the class is the exported object. 如果修饰类的成员，则导出的对象将是修饰成员的值。If a member of a class is decorated, the exported object will be the value of the decorated member. 协定匹配是否主要由协定名称和协定类型确定。Whether or not a contract matches is determined primarily by the contract name and the contract type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了三个修饰的类 ，以及与它们匹配的三个导入。The following example shows three classes decorated with the , and three imports that match them. [!code-csharp[ImportAndExport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/importandexport/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ImportAndExport#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/importandexport/vb/module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 通过在默认协定名称下导出使用此特性标记的类型或成员，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the default contract name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认协定名称是对 属性或字段类型调用方法或用此特性标记的类型的结果。The default contract name is the result of calling the method on the property or field type, or on the type that is marked with this attribute. 使用此特性标记的方法必须使用或指定协定名称或类型 。Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either or . 通过使用 属性执行区分大小写的非语言比较，对协定名称进行比较。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: contractName
param.span: 用于导出使用此特性标记的类型或成员的协定名称，或 或空字符串 ("") 以使用默认协定名称。

span.span: The contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.

summary.span: 通过在指定的协定名称下导出用此属性标记的类型或成员，来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under the specified contract name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认协定名称是对 属性或字段类型调用方法或用此特性标记的类型的结果。The default contract name is the result of calling the method on the property or field type, or on the type that this is marked with this attribute. 使用此特性标记的方法必须使用或指定协定名称或类型 。Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either or . 通过使用 属性执行区分大小写的非语言比较，对协定名称进行比较。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: contractType
param.span: 从中派生用于导出使用此特性标记的类型或成员的协定名称的类型，或 以使用默认协定名称。

span.span: A type from which to derive the contract name that is used to export the type or member marked with this attribute, or to use the default contract name.

summary.span: 通过在派生自指定类型的协定名称下导出使用此特性标记的类型或成员，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the type or member marked with this attribute under a contract name derived from the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定名称是对调用方法的结果 `contractType` 。The contract name is the result of calling the method on `contractType`. 默认协定名称是对 属性或字段类型调用方法或用此特性标记的类型的结果。The default contract name is the result of calling the method on the property or field type, or on the type that is marked with this attribute. 使用此特性标记的方法必须使用或指定协定名称或类型 。Methods marked with this attribute must specify a contract name or a type by using either or . 通过使用 属性执行区分大小写的非语言比较，对协定名称进行比较。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

summary.span: 通过在指定协定名称下导出指定类型，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, exporting the specified type under the specified contract name.

remarks.format: 默认协定名称是 对属性或字段类型调用的结果，或者在类型本身上调用的，这是用此特性标记的。The default contract name is the result of calling on the property or field type, or on the type itself that this is marked with this attribute. 使用区分大小写的非语言比较来比较协定名称 。The contract name is compared using a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison using .

The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 获取由此特性附加到的成员导出的协定类型。

span.span: Gets the contract type that is exported by the member that this attribute is attached to.
The type of export that is be provided.

value.span: 默认值为 ，这表示将通过查看此导出附加到的成员上的类型来获取类型。

span.span: The default value is , which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this export is attached to.
